column5: I cross the border into Canada at Intl. Falls. What is being required in 2006 going in both directions? Is a drivers license still good enough or do you need birth certificate or passport? The Customs gentleman I talked to coming back into the States last Fall said a minimum of a birth certificate would probably be required. Passports take time to get & cost money $75 to $90 I heard. If anyone can assist with this question it would be greatly appreciated.
Drivers Lience is all I have ever used and it worked. Nothing special this year.
[font color=green size=3][b]https://www.walleyecentral.com/dc/dcb...=320730&page=4 Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby
